metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9274 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
UnRTF allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code as demonstrated by a file containing the string "{\cb-999999999".

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9274` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

unrtf - 0.21.5-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unrtf package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.21.5-2').
